replies.body: This needs to be said, I want the old MCZONE Skywars, not the Hypixel skywars n whatnot. The one with the two teams, the middle. One life. THAT skywars was the goat and was extremely fun.
replies.body_tagged: This needs to be said, I want the old MCZONE Skywars, not the Hypixel skywars n whatnot. The one with the two teams, the middle. One life. THAT skywars was the goat and was extremely fun.

replies.body:
I was thinking of having Sky Wars be more mixed up so it's more interesting:
- Two team Sky Wars
- 12-16 Team Sky Wars
- Free-for-all Sky Wars

These would be better in a rotation, and attract more players. I could make the rotation switch off each one so you would know when one of your favorites are coming on.
